message: But it seems like the problem is that you are embedding the same javascript twice in the page.
Perhaps a smarter bookmarklet would check if your script is already there and if so just fire it.
For instance, a user clicks the bookmarklet and get a notify.  If they close the notify and click the bookmarklet again, they get two of the same notify and so on.
You could use javascript as described here: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/4541002/how-can-i-avoid-floating-the-same-content-twice
